analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa āsa vaduka sa ni dassa nattika

original: Nasāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa āsavam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naanāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na anāsavam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Nasāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlassa purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa āsavam na a nidassana sa paṭigha mūlassa purima nayena tīṇi pañhāḥ hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naanāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na anāsavam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sa āsavaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
